name: Drop / Raise Price for WooCommerce (over time)
author: wpgenie

sections.description:
Drop / Raise Price for WooCommerce (over time) is a plugin and excellent marketing tool which allows you to lower (or raise) price of a product over time in steps say $10 or 5% every hour.

Support

You can contact us at our website wpgenie.org if you have problems or questions. Complete plugin documentation is here.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or greater
  • WooCommerce 5.0 or greater

Setup

This section describes how to install Drop / Raise Price for WooCommerce (over time) plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Go to WordPress user list.

If you have any problems contact us at https://wpgenie.org/
sections.faq:
Have a question?

If you want answer here please send us your questions to info@wpgenie.org
